payload.title: Refactor DashboardTUI for Testability with Dependency Injection
payload.description:
Context: DashboardTUI uses hardcoded DependencyInjectionService.getInstance(), making it impossible to test with ink-testing-library.

Goal: Refactor to accept callbacks via props (onDeleteTask, onInvalidateCache, onRefresh) instead of fetching dependencies internally.

Acceptance Criteria:
- DashboardTUI accepts callback props
- dashboard-command.ts injects real callbacks  
- Tests in dashboard-tui-interactive.test.ts can be unskipped
- All existing functionality continues working

Technical Details: See packages/cli/e2e/dashboard-tui-interactive.test.ts for test templates

References:
- packages/cli/src/components/dashboard/DashboardTUI.tsx:509-523
- packages/cli/src/commands/dashboard/dashboard-command.ts
